headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Uber After Its Strong Multi Year Share Price Surge?
summary: If you are wondering whether Uber Technologies is still a smart buy after its massive run, or if you have already missed the boat, you are in the right place to unpack what the current share price really implies. The stock has cooled slightly in the near term, down 0.7% over the last week and 3.1% over the past month. It is still up 28.6% year to date and 31.3% over the last year, with a 229.8% gain over 3 years and 56.4% over 5 years. Recent headlines have focused on Uber tightening its...
